alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 7:58PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Goshen and northeastern Platte Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 758 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lakeview North, or near Wheatland, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wheatland, Guernsey, Chugcreek, Lakeview North, Y-O Ranch, Grayrocks Reservoir, Guernsey Campground and Hartville. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 78 and 89. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County
